name: Repair & Resilience Stack
mechanism: BPC-157 promotes angiogenesis and tissue-specific repair while TB-500 enhances cell migration and reduces systemic inflammation. Combined, they address both local injury and systemic recovery.

bpc157.administration: Subcutaneous or oral (oral for gut issues)

cycling: Acute injuries: 4-6 weeks. Chronic issues: 8-12 weeks with breaks
synergy_notes: BPC-157's angiogenic and repair signaling complements TB-500's systemic anti-inflammatory and cell migration effects
considerations: Can inject near injury site or systemically
BPC-157 oral administration effective for gut issues

special_applications.sibo_gut_health: BPC-157 oral 250-500mcg 2x daily for direct gut repair
special_applications.acute_injury: Increase frequency, inject near injury if possible
special_applications.chronic_inflammation: Focus on TB-500 for systemic effects
special_applications.with_kpv: Add KPV 500-1000mcg daily for enhanced anti-inflammatory effects, especially for gut-focused healing
